revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 83:;Aphrodisios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetesouchos, copper drachmas 8;;Patron, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Menandros, grandson of Anchophis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Germanos, slave of Longinus Isidoros, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha, copper drachmas 4;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, copper drachmas 8;;Onnophris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petaus, mother Tkateis, copper drachma obols 28;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Besis, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Sisois, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapais, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 68 obols 28;;(Pauni) 23 likewise:;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, copper drachmas 4;;Athenion, son of Horos, grandson of Pakysis, mother Heras, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Nekpheraus, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Nekpheraus, mother Taonnophris, copper drachmas (of priests) 4;;Euhemeros, son of Neilos, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Taeuhemeros, obols 28;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, copper drachma (of priests) obols 28;;Petesouchos, son of Hatres, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas 4;;Polis, son of Petheus, grandson of Keras, mother Herais, obols 28;;Eutyches, slave of Sarapias, drachmas 4 obols 20, copper drachma obols 8;;Kastor, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tremmenesis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Priskos alias Pasoxis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas (of priests) 4;;Satabous, son of Phaesis, grandson of Sarapion, mother Philoumene, copper drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambas, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8 copper drachmas 4;;Tapetheus, daughter of Pasoknopaios through the agency of Polydeukes, son of Satornilos the wine merchant;;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 23) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 2 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 2 chalki 2;;Heras, son of Kelolis, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Euhemeros, son of Euhemeros, grandson of Keras, mother Tauris, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Soeris, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 108 obols 17.;(Epeiph) 24 likewise:;Pasion, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
